name: BullyBully Classroom
description:
In BullyBullyClassroom, you play as Harissa and her gang of bullies : you spend most of your time terrorizing your classmates.
Will you keep on your evil ways or turn against your former gangmembers?

Even in the heat of battle, you can try to convince students or enemies to join your team and fight with you!

This game was created during the Ludum Dare #37
